jobs.title: Senior Smart Contract Engineer (EVM)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Ellipsis Labs is a profitable, venture-backed New York-based startup building differentiated products and infrastructure in decentralized finance.

The company is the developer of Phoenix, the leading order book spot exchange on the Solana blockchain, and a top 10 DEX (decentralized exchange) with >$70B in volume since inception in 2023. Additionally, we are one of the most active and prominent on-chain market makers in crypto.

All roles are in the Ellipsis Labs office in New York City.

The Opportunity

Ellipsis Labs is seeking an inaugural EVM Senior Smart Contract Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will:

  • Develop and maintain critical smart contracts for the EVM, along with the appropriate monitoring systems

  • Serve as in-house expert and mentor on the EVM

Qualifications

Required

  • Experience building, deploying, and maintaining EVM smart contracts in production

  • Experience working with auditors

  • Deep understanding of Ethereum and low-level EVM concepts

  • A demonstrated track record of high agency, willingness to dive into unfamiliar technical and non-technical areas, and a team-first attitude

  • Passion for decentralized finance

Preferred

  • Experience with cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS

  • Experience with Rust or other statically typed languages

  • Experience in quant trading or DeFi

jobs.title: Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Ellipsis Labs is a profitable, venture-backed New York-based startup building differentiated products and infrastructure in decentralized finance.

The company is the developer of Phoenix, the leading order book spot exchange on the Solana blockchain, and a top 10 DEX (decentralized exchange) with >$70B in volume since inception in 2023. Additionally, we are one of the most active and prominent on-chain market makers in crypto.

All roles are in the Ellipsis Labs office in New York City.

Ellipsis Labs is seeking a growth manager to drive adoption, partnerships, and operational excellence across our products. You’ll help scale Phoenix by managing external relationships, developing internal systems, and executing growth initiatives that bring in users, liquidity, and integrations.

In this role, you will:

  • Build and manage a pipeline of external partnerships, including market makers, wallets, aggregators, and infrastructure projects, from sourcing and qualification through execution

  • Collaborate closely with product engineering teams to deliver integrations end-to-end, defining technical requirements and ensuring smooth launches

  • Develop and own marketing and communication channels, including company social media, partner announcements, and launch campaigns

  • Build user support and internal operational flows, ensuring questions, feedback, and issues are resolved efficiently

  • Represent Ellipsis Labs in external conversations, calls, and select industry events

  • Create concise marketing and partner materials, such as decks, one-pagers and product overviews, to support outreach and business development

Qualifications

Required

  • Experience in business development, operations, or marketing, ideally in crypto, fintech, or trading (exchange, market maker, wallet, or related)

  • Demonstrated ability to own projects end-to-end, from planning through execution and follow-up

  • Clear, concise communicator who values substance and clarity over jargon

  • High agency and strong judgment, capable of operating independently in ambiguous situations

  • Comfort working cross-functionally with engineers, design, legal, and leadership

  • Data-oriented mindset with experience managing metrics and dashboards

Preferred

  • Experience with Solana or other high-performance blockchains

  • Background at an exchange, DeFi protocol, or trading firm

  • Experience executing marketing campaigns or managing brand presence

  • Existing relationships with market makers, wallets, or other crypto ecosystem partners

jobs.title: Senior Visual Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Ellipsis Labs is a profitable, venture-backed New York-based startup building differentiated products and infrastructure in decentralized finance.

The company is the developer of Phoenix, the leading order book spot exchange on the Solana blockchain, and a top 10 DEX (decentralized exchange) with >$70B in volume since inception in 2023. Additionally, we are one of the most active and prominent on-chain market makers in crypto.

All roles are in the Ellipsis Labs office in New York City.

Ellipsis Labs is seeking a Senior Designer to define and elevate the visual language of our exchange and brand across high-density, real-time trading interfaces. You’ll partner with engineering and leadership to craft a cohesive, trustworthy look and feel - from component libraries to data visualization, motion, and launch assets. In this role, you will:

  • Own the visual system for Phoenix and future products: typography, color, spacing, iconography, design tokens, and component theming

  • Turn complex trading mechanics and data into clear, scannable visual hierarchies and data visualizations that perform under real-time constraints

  • Build and maintain a Figma library/design system, ensuring consistency and speed of implementation; provide developer-ready specs and assets

  • Drive visual polish on critical surfaces (order entry, positions, charts, risk states), including loading/empty/error states and micro-interactions/motion

  • Partner closely with engineers to ensure visual fidelity in production and pragmatic choices under technical constraints

  • Own the company and product brand expression across product surfaces and key moments

  • Incorporate feedback, user signals, and metrics to iterate quickly without sacrificing craft

Qualifications

Required

  • 2+ years designing visual systems for complex digital products, ideally high-density or data-heavy (trading/finance, analytics, dev tools, etc.).

  • Portfolio demonstrating strong visual craft (type, color, layout), system thinking (tokens/components), and clear data presentation.

  • Fluency in Figma (components/variants, auto-layout) and handoff practices; attention to detail across states and edge cases.

  • Comfort collaborating with engineers; ability to balance visual quality with performance and feasibility.

  • High ownership and bias to ship; you sweat the details and move quickly.

Preferred

  • Familiarity with crypto/Web3 design patterns and user behaviors

  • Exposure to Solana or similar blockchain ecosystems

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Campus (Intern & New Grad)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Ellipsis Labs is a profitable, venture-backed New York-based startup building differentiated products and infrastructure in decentralized finance.

The company is the developer of Phoenix, the leading order book spot exchange on the Solana blockchain, and a top 10 DEX (decentralized exchange) with >$70B in volume since inception in 2023. Additionally, we are one of the most active and prominent on-chain market makers in crypto.

All roles are in the Ellipsis Labs office in New York City.

Ellipsis Labs is seeking a Software Engineer — Campus (Intern & New Grad) to join our team. As an early-stage startup, we appreciate bright generalists who can iterate and ship quickly. In this role, you will:

  • Build real product features and/or platform components across the stack, front end, back end, infra, or on-chain, based on your skills and interest

  • Own scoped projects end-to-end: problem definition → design → implementation → testing → deployment → monitoring

  • Collaborate with design and engineering to deliver fast, reliable, and secure experiences

  • Instrument and improve performance, reliability, and observability; write clear tests and documentation

Qualifications

Required

  • Hands-on experience building software (courses, personal projects, research, or internships) in one or more languages such as TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, Rust, Java, C/C++; you write clear, tested code

  • Solid CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, systems thinking) and familiarity with Git and basic debugging

  • Ability to make informed trade-offs with business context; high agency and a team-first mindset

  • Curiosity about DeFi/crypto (prior domain experience not required)

Preferred

  • Experience in one or more areas: full-stack web (React/Javascript), backend APIs/services, infrastructure/DevOps (Docker, CI/CD, cloud), or on-chain/low-level systems

  • Familiarity with blockchain technology (Solana a plus)

  • Interest or experience in fintech/trading

  • Rust or TypeScript proficiency

This posting covers both Intern (10–12 weeks) and New Grad (full-time) tracks. Indicate your preference when you apply.
